meanings.definition: A book that is extremely popular and sells a large number of copies.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a special section dedicated to bestsellers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading bestsellers because they are usually very entertaining.
meanings.sent3: The library had so many bestsellers that it was hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: Her latest novel became a bestseller overnight, making her a household name.
meanings.sent5: The author's ability to write bestsellers consistently is truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of selling a large number of copies, typically referring to books.
meanings.sent1: Publishers often focus on marketing strategies to increase bestsellers.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore manager was thrilled with the high number of bestsellers sold last month.
meanings.sent3: The competition between authors to have the most bestsellers can be intense.
meanings.sent4: The success of a book becoming a bestseller can greatly impact an author's career.
meanings.sent5: The author's hard work paid off when their book became a bestseller.
